short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide feedback on how interactions with LLM applications (like ChatGPT) affect our wellbeing, to keep AI labs accountable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We want AI to improve our wellbeing. Help keep AI labs accountable to this by giving feedback on how AI applications (like ChatGPT) affect your wellbeing.

We don't see or collect any data about your interactions. The only data we have is the ratings you give and which AI tool you gave the rating on.
